scripts.build: pnpm run static; pnpm run elm-prod; pnpm run css-prod
scripts.static: pnpm run fonts; pnpm run html; pnpm run images;
scripts.ec-dev: pnpm run elm-dev && pnpm run css-dev
scripts.dev: pnpm run static; pnpm run elm-dev; pnpm run css-dev
scripts.watch: pnpm run dev && concurrently 'watchexec -p -w src -e elm -- pnpm run ec-dev' 'watchexec -p -w src -e html -- pnpm run html' 'watchexec -p -w ../src -i Internal/**/* -- "(cd ../; pnpx i18n-json-to-elm) && pnpm run ec-dev"'
